synapse.config.option.hud.showHealthPotC: Shows the number of splash health potions there are in your inventory.
synapse.config.option.hud.showNearbyHost: Shows how many nearby players are considered hostile.
synapse.config.option.hud.showNearbyFrie: Shows how many nearby players are considered friendly.
synapse.config.option.hud.showNearbyPlay: Shows how many nearby players there are.
